mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workspace ORDER BY spaceno DESC
SELECT e.empno, e.name, e.job, e.deptno, e.status, d.dname FROM emp e, dept d WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno AND e.empno = #{value}
SELECT d.dname, e.deptno, e.empno, e.job, e.name FROM emp e, dept d WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno AND e.deptno != 'A11'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace(spaceno, title, pm, totbudget, empnos) VALUES (sq_workspace.nextval, #{title}, #{pm}, #{totbudget}, #{empnos})
